title: Youâ€™ll soon be able to see recent apps from your Samsung phone on your Windows PC
content:
Samsung phone users, including those who buy the new Galaxy S22 series, are getting a new feature for the Your Phone app on Windows 11 and Windows 10. With an upcoming update, you’ll be able to see recent apps from your Samsung phone on your Windows PC’s taskbar, making it easier to pick up where

The post You’ll soon be able to see recent apps from your Samsung phone on your Windows PC appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Microsoft and Samsung are working on a feature that lets you see recent apps from your Samsung phone on the Your Phone app for Windows.
